name: Rubik (Whisker Games)
description:
The game was developed for the GeoJam 2022 as a prototype testing out a concept I came up with. The theme of the jam being pick a side, you are able to pick which side of the rubix cube to fight for! Most importantly, the geometric aspect of the game aims to respect the only real limitation in this jam, to make geometric games!

Developer

Follow @Whisker_Games_ on Twitter to follow me on my development journey!

Subscribe to my Youtube channel for trailers and teasers of my upcoming projects!

Follow my Hashnode blog to keep up with my latest articles!
